roleset.name: elaborate
roleset.note: DETAILED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme data. No comparison. Frame differs from detail.01-v in that you cannot have an Arg0 with detailed (*The report was extremely detailed by him) (from detailed-j.01)

role.descr: elaborate thing or that which is elaborated on

example.name: elaborate thing
example.text: The colonoscopy report is not extremely detailed
